summary: THE DEALER, AUTONATION CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM LITTLETON COLORADO HAS NOT COMPLIED WITH REPLACING THE RECALLED AIRBAGS.  I HAVE CALLED NUMEROUS TIMES, BROUGHT IN CAR ONCE AFTER GETTING APPOINTMENT (HAD TO WAIT 3 WEEKS FOR APPOINTMENT) DID NOT HAVE PART.  SAID THEY WOULD CALL WHEN PART CAME IN.  NO CALL.  REPEATED CALLS ARE DROPPED/PERSON ISN'T IN/LEAVE MESSAGE.  NOTHING.  APPOINTMENT DATE WAS 4/17/2017 9:30 AM.  CONTACT PERSON: D MULLEN & DAVID MCILRATH
